languages.text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

traits.locale_text: Deals Mental Damage and applies {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}Lethargy{/g} for 2 rounds. On a successful WIL Save (-50), {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}Lethargy{/g} is not applied. Special: If the target has <50% Wounds, it also receives 50% Temporary Wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Белая фаза (Разум).
Наносит средний Mental урон и 2 раунда накладывает на цель бафф (WIL Save -50).
Особое свойство: Если у цели <50% ХП, дополнительно дает ей 50% тХП.

languages.text: Неумирающий Император наносит цели психический урон. Цель выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −50 и в случае провала получает эффект {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}летаргия{/g} на 2 раунда. Особое свойство: если у цели меньше 50% здоровья, она получает временное здоровье, равное 50% от своего максимального здоровья.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

languages.text: El Emperador Inmortal inflige daño mental al objetivo. El objetivo debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −50 o sufrirá el efecto de {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}letargo{/g} durante 2 asaltos. Especial: si el objetivo tiene menos del 50 % de sus heridas, gana heridas temporales por valor del 50 % de sus heridas máximas.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

traits.locale_text: El Emperador Inmortal inflige daño mental al objetivo. El objetivo debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −50 o sufrirá el efecto de {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}letargo{/g} durante 2 asaltos. Especial: si el objetivo tiene menos del 50 % de sus heridas, gana heridas temporales por valor del 50 % de sus heridas máximas.

languages.text: 不死の皇帝が対象に精神的ダメージを与える。その対象は-50のペナルティで意志力の抵抗判定をパスしないと、2ラウンドの間、{g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}無気力{/g}の効果を受けることになる。 特殊条件：対象の一時体力が50%以下の場合、最大値の50%に相当する一時体力をその場しのぎに獲得する。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

traits.locale_text: 不死の皇帝が対象に精神的ダメージを与える。その対象は-50のペナルティで意志力の抵抗判定をパスしないと、2ラウンドの間、{g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}無気力{/g}の効果を受けることになる。 特殊条件：対象の一時体力が50%以下の場合、最大値の50%に相当する一時体力をその場しのぎに獲得する。

languages.text: 不死神皇对目标造成精神伤害。目标需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-50减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}死气沉沉{/g}状态，持续两轮。 特殊效果：如果目标的生命值低于50%，则会获得临时生命值，等同于最大生命值的50%。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

traits.locale_text: 不死神皇对目标造成精神伤害。目标需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-50减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}死气沉沉{/g}状态，持续两轮。 特殊效果：如果目标的生命值低于50%，则会获得临时生命值，等同于最大生命值的50%。

languages.text: Der Todlose Imperator fügt dem Ziel Mentalschaden zu. Das Ziel muss eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -50 bestehen, sonst wird es 2 Runden lang mit dem {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}Lethargie{/g}-Effekt belegt. Spezial: Hat das Ziel weniger als 50 % Wunden, erhält es temporäre Wunden in Höhe von 50 % seiner maximalen Wunden.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose Imperator fügt dem Ziel Mentalschaden zu. Das Ziel muss eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -50 bestehen, sonst wird es 2 Runden lang mit dem {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}Lethargie{/g}-Effekt belegt. Spezial: Hat das Ziel weniger als 50 % Wunden, erhält es temporäre Wunden in Höhe von 50 % seiner maximalen Wunden.

languages.text: L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts mentaux à la cible. Celle-ci doit réussir un test de résistance de Volonté avec une pénalité de −50. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}Léthargie{/g} pendant 2 rounds. Spécial : si la cible a moins de 50 % de blessures, elle gagne un nombre de blessures temporaires égal à 50 % de ses blessures maximum.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to the target. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty or suffer the {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}lethargy{/g} effect for 2 rounds. Special: if the target has less than 50% wounds, it gains temporary wounds equal to 50% of its maximum wounds.

traits.locale_text: L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts mentaux à la cible. Celle-ci doit réussir un test de résistance de Volonté avec une pénalité de −50. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}Léthargie{/g} pendant 2 rounds. Spécial : si la cible a moins de 50 % de blessures, elle gagne un nombre de blessures temporaires égal à 50 % de ses blessures maximum.

L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts mentaux à la cible. Celle-ci doit réussir un test de résistance de Volonté avec une pénalité de −50. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|f:eda0a061c09a4ea090998a9c117b05cd}Léthargie{/g} pendant 2 rounds. Spécial : si la cible a moins de 50 % de blessures, elle gagne un nombre de blessures temporaires égal à 50 % de ses blessures maximum.
